root: ^Hgh… No… Selfish human and ghost… Nasty little plots… No…
^> Vincenzo waves his hands and his goons step forward, dragging the owlish ghost away.
^We’ll handle the investigation of that ghost’s background. Now, come with me.
^Have either of you heard of the “Ghost King”?
^I knew it was going to be about that bastard.
^Urk. Well. I may have lost to him in a fight...
^I see. I’m surprised you escaped him before he consumed you completely.
^It’s not like I meant for that to happen. If I had it my way, that miserable wretch would be dead twice over.
^Is this ‘Ghost King’ the one that’s posing a danger to both worlds?
^Yes, and he wants the Nachzehrer’s Crown in order to achieve his ambitions.
^I need someone to investigate him. Someone that he cannot absorb and will not fall under his control or influence.
^What do you want us to do, Vincenzo?
^Sounds like I really am your best bet then.
^I won’t ask you to put yourselves in the line of fire of the Ghost King. We need time to investigate that owl-head.
^I will contact you when I have information. You may leave now.
